_meta.description: Platform-specific prompt assembly rules with token limits for silent optimization. Each platform gets optimal formatting and length.

_defaults.notes: Default fallback for platforms not explicitly configured

midjourney.tips: Short, punchy keywords work best. Style and mood early. Use --no sparingly.
midjourney.exampleOutput: portrait of a samurai, fighting, cinematic lighting, dramatic mood, golden hour --no blur --no text

openai.tips: DALL·E prefers full sentences. Avoid technical jargon. Be descriptive.
openai.exampleOutput: A portrait of a samurai warrior in a fighting stance with dramatic cinematic lighting, golden hour atmosphere, without blur or text

flux.tips: Flux handles detailed prompts well. Quality keywords like '8K', 'highly detailed' help.
flux.exampleOutput: portrait of a samurai, fighting stance, concept art, cinematic lighting, dramatic, 8K detail

leonardo.tips: Use weighting for emphasis (concept::1.5). Choose appropriate model for style.
leonardo.exampleOutput: portrait of a samurai::1.2, fighting, cinematic lighting, dramatic mood, concept art, highly detailed

stability.tips: Use quality boosters: masterpiece, best quality, highly detailed. Comprehensive negative prompts improve output.
stability.exampleOutput: masterpiece, best quality, portrait of a samurai, fighting, concept art, cinematic lighting, dramatic

dreamstudio.tips: Same as Stability AI. Use SDXL-optimised prompts for best results.
dreamstudio.exampleOutput: masterpiece, portrait of a samurai warrior, fighting stance, cinematic lighting, dramatic atmosphere, 8K

adobe-firefly.tips: Firefly auto-suggests as you type. Use style presets in UI rather than text. Clean, clear descriptions.
adobe-firefly.exampleOutput: A portrait of a samurai warrior in a fighting pose with dramatic cinematic lighting in golden hour

ideogram.tips: Ideogram excels at text in images. Include text requirements clearly.
ideogram.exampleOutput: A dramatic portrait of a samurai warrior, fighting stance, cinematic lighting, golden hour, without blur

playground.tips: Playground supports multiple models. Match prompt style to selected model.
playground.exampleOutput: portrait of a samurai, fighting, concept art, cinematic lighting, dramatic mood, highly detailed

novelai.tips: NovelAI uses {curly braces} for emphasis. Multiple braces = stronger weight.
novelai.exampleOutput: {{{masterpiece}}}, portrait of a samurai, fighting, cinematic lighting, dramatic, highly detailed

bing.tips: Uses DALL·E 3. Clear, natural language descriptions work best.
bing.exampleOutput: A dramatic portrait of a samurai warrior in a fighting stance with cinematic golden hour lighting

canva.tips: Simple descriptions work best. Use Canva's style presets.
canva.exampleOutput: samurai warrior in fighting pose, dramatic lighting, cinematic style

nightcafe.tips: NightCafe supports multiple algorithms. SD mode uses standard weighting.
nightcafe.exampleOutput: portrait of a samurai warrior, fighting, concept art, cinematic lighting, dramatic mood, 8K detail

bluewillow.tips: BlueWillow uses Midjourney-like syntax. Similar parameter flags.
bluewillow.exampleOutput: portrait of a samurai, fighting, cinematic lighting, dramatic --no blur --no text

lexica.tips: SD-based. Use quality tags and comprehensive negative prompts.
lexica.exampleOutput: masterpiece, portrait of a samurai, fighting pose, cinematic lighting, dramatic, highly detailed

getimg.tips: Multiple models available. Match prompt style to model.
getimg.exampleOutput: portrait of a samurai warrior, fighting, concept art, cinematic lighting, dramatic

openart.tips: SD-based with multiple models. Quality tags help.
openart.exampleOutput: portrait of a samurai, fighting, concept art, cinematic lighting, dramatic mood

picsart.tips: Mobile-first. Short, impactful prompts work best.
picsart.exampleOutput: samurai warrior portrait, fighting, dramatic lighting, cinematic

fotor.tips: Simple interface. Short prompts + style presets in UI.
fotor.exampleOutput: samurai warrior portrait, fighting pose, dramatic lighting, cinematic style

deepai.exampleOutput: portrait of a samurai warrior fighting with dramatic cinematic lighting

craiyon.tips: Free and simple. Short prompts work best. Don't expect high fidelity.
craiyon.exampleOutput: samurai warrior portrait, fighting, dramatic lighting

runway.tips: Runway excels at video concepts. Think in motion and atmosphere.
runway.exampleOutput: portrait of a samurai warrior, fighting, dramatic cinematic lighting, golden hour, atmospheric

google-imagen.tips: Google Imagen prefers clear, natural descriptions. Keep it concise.
google-imagen.exampleOutput: A dramatic portrait of a samurai warrior in a fighting stance with cinematic lighting during golden hour

microsoft-designer.tips: Microsoft Designer uses DALL·E. Keep prompts simple and descriptive.
microsoft-designer.exampleOutput: A dramatic portrait of a samurai warrior in a fighting stance with cinematic golden hour lighting

meta-imagine.tips: Meta Imagine prefers clear, simple descriptions.
meta-imagine.exampleOutput: A portrait of a samurai warrior fighting with dramatic lighting at golden hour

artistly.tips: Artistly has prompt extender feature. Start simple, let it expand.
artistly.exampleOutput: portrait of a samurai warrior, fighting, concept art, cinematic lighting, dramatic mood

clipdrop.tips: Clipdrop (Stability AI) prefers clean, direct descriptions.
clipdrop.exampleOutput: portrait of a samurai warrior, fighting, dramatic cinematic lighting, golden hour atmosphere
